# preferredTransform

**Instance Property**

The preferred transform of the visual media.

## Declaration

```swift
var preferredTransform: CGAffineTransform { get }
```

## Discussion

The system retrieves the transform from the [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVAssetTrack] that provides the media data. If the source track doesn’t specify a transform, the value of this property is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/CoreGraphics/CGAffineTransformIdentity].

## Inspecting the configuration

- **sourcePlayerItem**: The player item that’s the source of this configuration.
- **dataChannelDescription**: An array of data channels selected for this configuration.
- **activationTime**: The host time this configuration became active on its associated player object.
